## Introduction
The dataset that I chose to investigate was the college major dataset from fivethirtyeight.
```{r library}
library(tidyverse)

```

Setup the datasets:
### Majors List  
```{r}
MajorsList <- read.csv("college-majors/majors-list.csv",header=TRUE,stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
head(MajorsList)
colnames(MajorsList)

```

### all ages dataset
```{r}
allAges <- read.csv("college-majors/all-ages.csv",header = TRUE,stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
head(allAges)
colnames(allAges)

```


### recent grad dataset
```{r}
recentGrad<- read.csv("college-majors/recent-grads.csv",header = TRUE,stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
head(recentGrad)
colnames(recentGrad)

```
